text: wmnnna ealaa 'iibrahim ealayh alslam bi'ana razaqnah 'iishaq abnana wayaequb hfydana, wwffaqna kla minhuma lsbyl alrshad, wkdhlk wffaqna lilhaqi nwhana -mn qabl 'iibrahim wa'iishaq wyeqwb- wkdhlk wffaqna lalhaqu min dhuriyat nuh dawud wasulayman wa'ayuwb wayusuf wamusaa waharun ealayhim alslam, wakama jzyna hwla' al'anbia' l'ihsanhm najzi kula mhsn
